task_prompt: 在微博中查看当前热搜
send_prompt:
您对 Linux 操作系统非常熟悉。您的任务是操作计算机屏幕，完成指定的任务。
您现在的目标是操作计算机屏幕，视频宽度：1024，视频高度：768，总体目标是 "在微博中查看当前热搜"。

我们为这个总体目标制定了一个实施计划：

    1. 双击打开 Firefox 浏览器

    2. 在浏览器地址栏输入微博网址并进入

    3. 在微博页面寻找热搜链接或者入口

    4. 点击热搜链接或者入口以查看当前热搜


现在的子任务是 "在浏览器地址栏输入微博网址并进入"。
您可以使用鼠标和键盘，可选择的操作有：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"double_click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_down","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"move","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"KeyName in keysymdef"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "Hello, world!"},
    {"action_type":"WaitAction","wait_time":float}
]
```
其中，鼠标的位置是相对于屏幕左上角的坐标，键盘的按键请参考 [keysymdef.h]。

请输出执行动作，请以 json 格式输出您的动作，例如：
我的计划是点击左下角的开始按钮，因此我的操作将是：
```json 
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":10,"height":760}}
]
```

另一个例子，我的计划是打开记事本，我看到屏幕上有Mousepad，因此我的操作将是：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Super_L"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_text":"notepad"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Return"}
]
```


现在的子任务是 "在浏览器地址栏输入微博网址并进入"，请根据现有屏幕图像的状态给出详细的下一步操作。
LLM_response:
The image shows the Firefox web browser open with a new tab that displays the default start page. There is a shortcut to Weibo on the top sites section, which makes it easier to achieve the subtask. Instead of typing the Weibo URL, you can directly click the Weibo shortcut.

Here are the JSON-formatted actions to achieve this:

```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":800,"height":300}}
]
```

This action will click the Weibo shortcut, taking you directly to the Weibo website without having to manually enter the URL in the address bar. If precise coordinates are needed for the location of the Weibo shortcut, these may be adjusted according to the actual position on the screen, which would typically be determined programmatically or by examining the image pixel by pixel.
LLM_response_editer:
如图所示，火狐浏览器打开了一个新标签页，显示默认的开始页面。在顶部网站部分有一个微博快捷方式，这使得实现子任务变得更加容易。您可以直接点击微博快捷方式，而不用键入微博网址。

```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":691,"height":336}}
]
```

此操作将点击微博快捷方式，直接进入微博网站，而无需在地址栏中手动输入 URL。
task_prompt_en: View the current hot search in Weibo
task_prompt_zh: 在微博中查看当前热搜
send_prompt_en:
You are familiar with the Linux operating system. Your task is to operate the computer screen and complete the specified task.
Your current goal is to operate the computer screen. Video width: 1024, video height: 768. The overall goal is to "view the current hot search in microblog".
We have formulated an implementation plan for this overall goal:
1. Double click to open Firefox browser
2. Enter the microblog website in the browser address bar and enter
3. Find hot search links or portals on microblog pages
4. Click the hot search link or portal to view the current hot search
Now the sub task is "enter the microblog address in the browser address bar and enter".
You can use the mouse and keyboard. The operations you can select are:```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"double_click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_down","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"move","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"KeyName in keysymdef"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "Hello, world!"},
    {"action_type":"WaitAction","wait_time":float}
]
```The position of the mouse is the coordinate relative to the upper left corner of the screen. For keyboard keys, see [keysymdef. h].
Please output the execution action. Please output your action in json format, for example:
My plan is to click the Start button at the bottom left corner, so my operation will be:```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 10, "height": 760}}
]
```Another example, my plan is to open notepad. I see Mousepad on the screen, so my operation will be:```json
[
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Super_L"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "notepad"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Return"}
]
```The current sub task is "Enter the microblog address in the browser address bar and enter". Please give detailed next steps according to the status of the existing screen image.
send_prompt_zh:

您现在的目标是操作计算机屏幕，视频宽度：1024，视频高度：768，总体目标是 "在微博中查看当前热搜"。

    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_down","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"move","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"KeyName in keysymdef"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},

LLM_response_editer_zh:
如图所示，火狐浏览器打开了一个新标签页，显示默认的开始页面。在顶部网站部分有一个微博快捷方式，这使得实现子任务变得更加容易。您可以直接点击微博快捷方式，而不用键入微博网址。

```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 691, "height": 336}}
]
```

此操作将点击微博快捷方式，直接进入微博网站，而无需在地址栏中手动输入 URL。
